Sentencas: Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 a parts per thousand currency sign x a parts per thousand currency sign 0.55) perovskite oxides have been synthesized by solid-state reaction method to study their properties as a cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Influence of Ca2+ substitution on thermal, structural, and conductivity behavior of Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 aparts per thousandcurrency sign x aparts per thousandcurrency sign 0.55)

Sentencas: The as prepared samples were characterized by X-ray diffraction, differential thermal analyzer/thermogravimetry, dilatometer, and impedance spectroscopy to study their structural, thermal, and electrical properties.
Titulo: Influence of Ca2+ substitution on thermal, structural, and conductivity behavior of Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 aparts per thousandcurrency sign x aparts per thousandcurrency sign 0.55)

Sentencas: The Rietveld refinement results confirmed that all the samples exhibit tetragonal structure with P4mm space group.
Titulo: Influence of Ca2+ substitution on thermal, structural, and conductivity behavior of Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 aparts per thousandcurrency sign x aparts per thousandcurrency sign 0.55)

Sentencas: In addition to this, sample x = 0.55 exhibits Ca2Fe2O5 as a secondary phase.
Titulo: Influence of Ca2+ substitution on thermal, structural, and conductivity behavior of Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 aparts per thousandcurrency sign x aparts per thousandcurrency sign 0.55)

Sentencas: It has been observed that lattice parameters decrease with increase in calcium content.
Titulo: Influence of Ca2+ substitution on thermal, structural, and conductivity behavior of Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 aparts per thousandcurrency sign x aparts per thousandcurrency sign 0.55)

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient and ionic conductivity increases with increase in calcium content up to x = 0.50.
Titulo: Influence of Ca2+ substitution on thermal, structural, and conductivity behavior of Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 aparts per thousandcurrency sign x aparts per thousandcurrency sign 0.55)

Sentencas: The highest ionic conductivity is observed for Bi0.5Ca0.5FeO3-y i.e. 1.71 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Influence of Ca2+ substitution on thermal, structural, and conductivity behavior of Bi1-xCaxFeO3-y (0.40 aparts per thousandcurrency sign x aparts per thousandcurrency sign 0.55)
